attributes.action: Allow Ashya King to have the treatment he deserves and free his parents
attributes.additional_details: Allow Ashya King to be given the treatment that his parents intended that is not currently available on the NHS and a lot less harmful for a small child. De-Arrest his parents and let them focus on raising the money to pay for his treatment in Czechoslovakia.

rejection.details: There is already a petition calling for the parents to be released.
